mapper.sql: zomore_commodity_storeid, zomore_commodity_id, zomore_commodity_store, zomore_commodity_uplimit, zomore_commodity_downlimit, zomore_commodity_inventory_position
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM zomore_commodity_store WHERE zomore_commodity_store < zomore_commodity_downlimit and zomore_commodity_inventory_position = #{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT * FROM zomore_commodity_store a,zomore_commodity b WHERE b.zomore_commodity_id=a.zomore_commodity_id and zomore_commodity_store < zomore_commodity_downlimit and a.zomore_commodity_inventory_position =#{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize};

SELECT count(*) FROM zomore_commodity_store a,zomore_commodity b WHERE b.zomore_commodity_id=a.zomore_commodity_id and zomore_commodity_store < zomore_commodity_downlimit and a.zomore_commodity_inventory_position =#{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR};

SELECT * FROM zomore_commodity_store a,zomore_commodity b WHERE b.zomore_commodity_id=a.zomore_commodity_id and zomore_commodity_store < zomore_commodity_downlimit and a.zomore_commodity_inventory_position =#{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.zomore_commodity_type LIKE #{type} AND b.zomore_commodity_provide LIKE #{provide} AND b.zomore_commodity_name LIKE #{name} LIMIT #{pageNum},#{pageSize};

SELECT count(*) FROM zomore_commodity_store a,zomore_commodity b WHERE b.zomore_commodity_id=a.zomore_commodity_id and zomore_commodity_store < zomore_commodity_downlimit and a.zomore_commodity_inventory_position =#{shop,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND b.zomore_commodity_type LIKE #{type} AND b.zomore_commodity_provide LIKE #{provide} AND b.zomore_commodity_name LIKE #{name};

select
distinct
from zomore_commodity_store
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update zomore_commodity_store
zomore_commodity_storeid = #{record.zomoreCommodityStoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zomore_commodity_id = #{record.zomoreCommodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zomore_commodity_store = #{record.zomoreCommodityStore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_uplimit = #{record.zomoreCommodityUplimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_downlimit = #{record.zomoreCommodityDownlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_inventory_position = #{record.zomoreCommodityInventoryPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update zomore_commodity_store set zomore_commodity_storeid = #{record.zomoreCommodityStoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zomore_commodity_id = #{record.zomoreCommodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zomore_commodity_store = #{record.zomoreCommodityStore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zomore_commodity_uplimit = #{record.zomoreCommodityUplimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zomore_commodity_downlimit = #{record.zomoreCommodityDownlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zomore_commodity_inventory_position = #{record.zomoreCommodityInventoryPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update zomore_commodity_store
zomore_commodity_id = #{zomoreCommodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
zomore_commodity_store = #{zomoreCommodityStore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_uplimit = #{zomoreCommodityUplimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_downlimit = #{zomoreCommodityDownlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_inventory_position = #{zomoreCommodityInventoryPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where zomore_commodity_storeid = #{zomoreCommodityStoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update zomore_commodity_store
zomore_commodity_store = #{zomoreCommodityStore,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_uplimit = #{zomoreCommodityUplimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_downlimit = #{zomoreCommodityDownlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER},
zomore_commodity_inventory_position = #{zomoreCommodityInventoryPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where zomore_commodity_id = #{zomoreCommodityId}

update zomore_commodity_store set zomore_commodity_id = #{zomoreCommodityId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, zomore_commodity_store = #{zomoreCommodityStore,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zomore_commodity_uplimit = #{zomoreCommodityUplimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zomore_commodity_downlimit = #{zomoreCommodityDownlimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zomore_commodity_inventory_position = #{zomoreCommodityInventoryPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where zomore_commodity_storeid = #{zomoreCommodityStoreid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
